SKT_FIRST.name: Twin Fireball
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000004_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000004_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Flame Blast
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>35%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000004_2_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000004_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Elemental Burst
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nDeals increased damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies.\nDeals increased damage if the target is inflicted with <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000004_chain_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000004_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000004_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000004_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
